thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 7 of 3524
thread.title: Beckie

author: Beckie
title: Beckie
text:
This is the first time I have ordered from Thrift Books. I placed my order for three used books, as a test of this business.
Well I received confirmation emails right away. The books were shipped right away and I received them in only 4 days. I live in Idaho and they came from across the country.
I am WILDLY pleased and will order again.
Their selection is incredible.
Highly recommended
